amendment.description: To make $2,000,000 available for sampling, analysis, and clean-up related to the disposal of obsolete vessels owned or operated by the Federal Government in Suisun Bay, California.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3304 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3304 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S12913-12914, S12915-12916) To make $2,000,000 available for sampling, analysis, and clean-up related to the disposal of obsolete vessels owned or operated by the Federal Government in Suisun Bay, California.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3304 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3304 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Boxer.
